title: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife? - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Devoted Love Interests   Enemies Become Lovers   European Ambience   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Forced Marriage   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Nobles   Politics   Power Struggle   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Strong Love Interests
author: DD
description:
'You'd better not dream of being acknowledged as my wife. I would never have a successor with the daughter of Balazit.' 


Hearing that, Nadia almost said, 'I feel the same way.' 


Thank you, Marquis. I hope you keep your words.


***


'You said you had no intention of sharing the bed with me.'

“...”

'So for the sake of a successor, I suggest that you had no choice but to bring in a concubine...' 


Crack.

Nadia's head turned at the sound of something cracking. 

Then, a crack is seen in a corner of the table where her husband was. 


I mean, why was that table breaking all of a sudden?
>
